text: The Chevrolet Lova RV is a compact Minivan made by General Motors under Chevrolet from 2016 to 2019. == History and Features == The Chevrolet Lova RV was first shown at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2015.https://carnewschina.com/2015/11/20/chevrolet-lova-rv-debuts-on-the- guangzhou-auto-show-in-china/ and was launched in 2016. the Lova RV is made by the SAIC-GM joint-venture its based on the Chevrolet Sail and has a 1.4 liter petrol engine with a 5-speed manual transmission and a 4-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Chevrolet Lova RV was sold mainly in The Chinese Market during its entire production. == Discontinuation == The production of The Chevrolet Lova RV ended in 2019 and was replaced by the Chevrolet Orlando. == References == Lova RV Category:2010s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Chevrolet Lova RV
